channel.title: Home on Byron Donaldson
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Byron Donaldson

item.title: Field Notes - Cincinnati
item.description: Last updated: 30 Apr 2024 Notes: First impressions of Cincinnati (And the USA) As it happens, in the great year of 2024 I have moved to Cincinnati. Nevermind why, that’s my business. Anyway, I thought I’d put down some field notes from the first couple of months - first impressions and questions and all that - sort of Devon Zuegel on Miami inspired. These are just the passing observations of an ignorant Southern African, don’t take them too seriously - no doubt there will be some prize foolishness throughout.

item.title: Interesting questions, for yourself, and others
item.description: A good question can be a wonderful thing. Well, I thought I might start a collection! To get better at questions, and to probe more deeply into my own skull, for both general psychic inquiries and more specific situations. If you have good ones, please share them with me! This list will be living. (Source/inspiration provided when known/suitable) What important truth do very few people agree with you on?

item.title: Making a Personal Running Heatmap in R & Python
item.description: Making an interactive running map Last updated: Nov 2023 “A race? You’ve lost your mind! Jogging is private, you don’t jog for an audience." Cop 223, Chungking Express I have, by now, been running for almost 6 years, cosying up to 17 000 kms. One of the treats of running is as an act of exploration. To explore on foot places you are visiting, a reason to go to a particular place, and to explore closer to home - the area you live.

item.title: Chiloe
Books
item.description: I love finding book lists. Channeling Garfunkel, I’m just putting everything - well, since I decided to keep track. 2024-10-26 Rand, Atlas Shrugged 2024-09-09 Russell, The Conquest of Happiness 2024-08-01 Pirsig, Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance 2024-06-23 Suskind, Perfume 2024-06-08 Lewis, An Experiment in Criticism 2024-05-20 McCarthy, All the Pretty Horses 2024-05-10 Dostoyevsky, The Brothers Karamazov 2024-02-02 Thoreau, On the Duty of Civil Disobedience 2024-01-07 Steinbeck, East of Eden 2024-01-02 Hemingway, The Old Man and the Sea 2023-12-27 Hesse, Siddhartha 2023-12-12 Glass, Words Without Music 2023-12-01 Wylie, Shaka, a pocket biography 2023-11-23 Vonnegut, Slaughterhouse 5 2023-11-10 Deshimaru, The Zen Way to the Martial Arts 2023-10-31 Atwood, The Handmaids Tale 2023-10-23 Solzhenitsyn, One Day In The Life of Ivan Denisovich 2023-10-12 Bird & Sherwin, American Prometheus 2023-10-11 Attia, Outlive 2023-08-13 Krakauer, Into the Wild 2023-07-12 Gallwey, The Inner Game of Tennis 2023-06-25 Meredith, Born in Africa 2023-06-12 Towles, The Lincoln Highway 2023-05-30 Lee, To Kill A Mockingbird 2023-05-23 Bryson, A Walk in the Woods 2023-04-24 Tan Twan Eng, The Gift of Rain 2023-04-04 Bird, Among the Tibetans 2023-04-01 Von Clausewitz, On the Nature of War 2023-03-22 Browder, Freezing Notice 2023-03-15 Burkeman, Four Thousand Weeks 2023-03-04 Jaynes, The Origin of Consciousness in the Breakdown of the Bicameral Mind 2023-02-15 McDougall, Born to Run 2023-02-10 Deutsch, The Beginning of Infinity 2023-01-02 McConaughey, Greenlights 2022-12-30 Woolf, Mrs.

item.title: Links
item.description: Things on the internet. Perhaps to your taste. Argentina on Two Steaks a Day, Maciej Ceglowski Las Torres del Paine, Maciej Ceglowski The Place to Disappear, Susan Orlean Switzerland: The Land of Joyce, Daniel Davies Shipping Out, David Foster Wallace Goodbye to all that, Joan Didion Arrival - Facing the Fear of Existence, Like Stories of Old Paterson - Everyday Virtue & David Foster Wallace - Like Stories of Old E Unibus Plurum: Television and U.

item.title: Writing
item.description: Just Do 100 Things! After all, there are plenty of people writing badly on the internet, why not me? 1/100 Chiloe
